flawed_nl_solution:
After the first spray kills 50% of germs, there will be 100 - 50 = <<100-50=80>>80% left.
The second spray kills 25%, but 5% have already been killed by the 50% spray, so it kills 25 - 5 = <<25-5=20>>20%.
After the second spray kills 20% of the remaining germs, there will be 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60% left.
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
